title: Interpretation of seeing a farewell or cup reader in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cup reader in a dream, meanings of seeing farewell in a dream, what is the interpretation of seeing fortune tellers in a dream, ways to say goodbye, reading the cup and its consequences in a dream, reading the cup, and ways to say goodbye. The things that astrologers use in their work to mislead people that what they say is true and they can predict the future, and in the interpretation of seeing a cup reader and depositing dreams, he explains this in the follow-up to our article today on our Vision website.Interpretation of seeing a cup reader in a dreamSeeing a glasses reader in a dreamIt indicates an immoral woman or A witch who openly indulges in immorality and aggression. Seeing a reading cup in a dream indicates a vile woman who plans to harm others. Seeing a cup reading a man in a dream denotes a person who follows delusion, deception and cunning. Interpretation of seeing a cup being read in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, a woman reading her cup In a dream, it indicates the presence of a woman with reputation and morals. Seeing a single woman reading a cup of coffee after drinking it in a dream indicates that he is committing a great or obscene sin. Seeing a single woman reading a cup of coffee in a dream indicates worries and problems in her life. Interpretation of seeing a woman reading a cup in a dream. Seeing a woman A married woman in a dream with a cup and reading it shows that she is confused about something in her life or that she feels confused and unstable. A married woman saw that she drank her coffee, turned the cup over and gave it to a woman who read it to her in a dream. It indicates that there is a woman in her life who wants to cause her trouble and harm and seeks to destroy and harm her. Seeing A married woman in a dream reads a cup and gives him money. It indicates exposure to limited livelihood and loss. Seeing a fortune teller in a dream indicates anxiety and sadness. Seeing a cup of coffee in a dream for a married woman states that the fortune teller is going through a difficult period in her life. Interpretation of seeing a cup read in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing you reading a cup in a dream for a pregnant womanMale The fortune teller is contrary to the above. Seeing a cup reader in a pregnant woman’s dream tells her that she is giving birth to a girl. Remembering her diet with a male. Seeing a cup reader reading in the final dream. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream of a cup reader indicates the need for attention and attention from the surrounding women. Seeing a divorced woman reading the cup or even another woman reading it. She stated that she befriends corrupt people who harm her. Interpretation of seeing a man reading a cup in a dream. Seeing a man reading a cup in a dream indicates many problems. Seeing a cup reading a cup in a dream: It symbolizes that the dreamer follows fads and temptations. Seeing a man reading a cup in a dream shows that the dreamer is doing something that causes shame. Really. Seeing a man reading a cup in a dream indicates the sins and sins that he has committed. We are pleased on the site to see the reception of your dreams about “Interpretation of seeing a farewell or cup,” through comments and the dream team will interpret your dream, answer and communicate with you.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about talking to a lover from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a conversation with a lover: It is one of the things that many have wondered about due to its importance and special signs. If you see it in your dream and want to know what it refers to, this article will be very suitable for you because of the information and interpretations it contains. It contains many lawyers and interpreters who are known for their honesty in telling us all the time. Interpretation of a dream about a conversation with a lover: If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is talking with her lover, this symbolizes that she thinks about him a lot and wants to be together all the time, which makes her see him even in her dreams, so we pray to God. (Let the rise) for them be in good condition and they will soon be reunited with each other. While a young man sees in his dream that he is talking violently with his beloved and quarrels, this indicates that there will be many disagreements between them in the coming days and a confirmation of their inability to deliver appropriate solutions to their common issues. While a woman who sees during her sleep that she is talking with her lover joyfully, this vision indicates that she will soon hear a lot of happy news that will bring a lot of joy and pleasure to her heart. Interpretation of a dream about talking with a lover, Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the girl’s vision of talking with Her lover in a dream as a date with the fulfillment of the desires that she has always aspired to and desired throughout her life, which will make her happy in the coming period. Whereas if a girl sees herself talking to her ex-boyfriend in a dream, this symbolizes her reconsideration and her desire to restore her relationship with him once again. Another, so she must rethink this matter so that she does not regret her behavior and return again to the field of her sadness. While the young man is talking to his ex-girlfriend nervous and tense, his vision shows that he wants to harm her and wants to take revenge on her by leaving him and keeping her away from him by any means, so He needs to calm down and calm down. He goes. The matter is up to God Almighty. Secrets of Dream InterpretationThe expert includes a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access it, type online page Secrets of Dream Interpretation on Google.Interpretation of a dream about talking with a lover for a single womanIf an unmarried woman sees herself talking to her while she is engaged in love, her dream symbolizes that their engagement will go well and will culminate in a happy marriage soon. She just needs to prepare herself for most of the usual wedding preparations. Enjoy many happy days with her life partner in the near future. As for the girl who sees in her dream that she is talking to her lover and asking for her help and assistance, this shows her that he is a cooperative person and will be the most loving and loyal wife when their relationship culminates. This is confirmed by her vision. Interpretation of a dream when she sees someone she loves several times. The dreamer’s vision of the girl he loves in a dream often indicates that something bad will happen to her in the coming days that she cannot deal with in any way. On the other hand, if a girl sees her lover in a dream Several times in a row, this symbolizes

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing blood by Ibn Sirin and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing bleeding according to Ibn Sirin. The significance of bleeding and bleeding from a person in a dream sometimes carries unexpected signs and other times carries positive signs. Seriously, while bleeding out of necessity is an indicator of the health and comfort that the dreamer enjoys, in this context we explain to you in detail the interpretation of a dream about seeing bleeding by Ibn Sirin and the most famous interpreters.Interpretation of a dream in which he sees himself bleeding, according to Ibn Sirin. Bleeding is linked to the flow of blood and its exit from the blood vessels, Either due to a wound sustained by the body, or as a result of high blood pressure within the blood vessels. The following lines: Seeing bleeding in a dream means that the child or partner will not benefit from it. While seeing bleeding and a change in the color of blood in a dream indicates the death of a loved one. It should be noted that blood in a dream is a sign of great strife. While heavy bleeding in a dream It is annoying, and may indicate spending without will and ingratitude. And if he sees that he is bleeding in a dream, and sees traces of wounds, this is evidence that he enjoys his physical health. Seeing a bleeding wound in a dream also indicates the return of the absent person. But to see in a dream that he is bleeding without a wound This indicates loss if the dreamer is rich, but if he is poor, this indicates the flow of money to him. Seeing blood with blood in a dream also indicates temporary illnesses. But if a person sees bleeding in the abdominal area in his dream, this is evidence of disobedience from the dreamer’s children. While black blood bleeding in the dreamer’s dream is evidence of his bad morals. On the other hand, seeing blood bleeding from the veins in a dream means a lack of money for the pioneer as well as blood. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fear of falling from a high place. Interpretation of seeing bleeding in a dream? Can it The bleeding is temporary and stops after a while or as a result of medical intervention, and it can be continuous and pose a threat to human life. Regardless, we explain to you what it means to see bleeding in a dream: If one sees in his dream that he is bleeding a lot, this is an indication that he will get a lot of money. In the event that there is a certain nosebleed, the vision indicates a lot of goodness in the field of work. In addition, In addition, seeing bleeding for a long time, but the fortuneteller was able to restore his health, was a sign of money and power. See also: Interpretation of a dream about drowning in a dream by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a single woman? Although blood is sometimes considered corrupt for the vision, It has connotations according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and some commentators. In this context, we explain what is the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees in a dream red blood coming out of her body, then this vision is good news that she will soon marry a young man of good character. While she sees menstrual blood in a woman’s dream or any For a woman, it is a sign of vulva. While menstrual blood in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the approaching date of her engagement, it is also an indication of the end of sorrows and worries. On the other hand, seeing pieces of meat covered in blood indicates that the single woman is in a hurry.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a mosque in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the mosque in a dream in Al-Osaimi The mosque is considered one of the holiest religious symbols, and we often feel happiness and joy when we see the mosque in a dream, as it is a place of worship for Muslims, where prayer is performed, and other religious symbols that make souls rise and feel reassured, so what are their meanings? Mosque in a dream? What omens does this dream hold for us? We will learn this together. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a mosque in a dream Al-Osaimi Interpretation of a dream about a mosque in a dream Al-Osaimi Interpretation of a dream about a mosque in a dream according to Al-Osaimi, as this dream is considered one of the promising dreams that carries many different omens. And if she sees that she wants to enter the mosque to pray in it This is good news that she is on the straight path, and will not deviate from this path throughout her life. And if she sees that she is eating in the mosque: this is good news for her that there is a good man who will marry her, and if she sees her entering the mosque without praying in it: this is a sign. From her imminent marriage. Read also: Washing the dead. The vision of the mosque for a married woman. If she sees that she is praying in the mosque, this is one of the good dreams that express the love of others for her, and that they are trying to please her. And if she sees that her husband is performing itikaf in the mosque, this is evidence that her husband is one of the righteous and works to Please those around him and you will live a stable and happy life with him. The fruits of these good deeds. Read also: Penguin in a dream: I dreamed that I was giving birth in the mosque. A pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is giving birth in the mosque is a sign that her own birth will be much easier and that God will grant her good offspring. But if you think that he wants to enter the mosque, this is a sign of He is trying to get closer to God and stay away from the sins and disobedience that he commits. Read also: Pregnancy in a dreamPraying in the mosquePraying in the mosque is a promising thing. This dream basically shows the arrival of goodness and abundance to the dreamer. This dream also symbolizes repentance to God and abandonment of sins and disobedience, and it also symbolizes that the dreamer responds to the call. Whoever believes that he is building a mosque is one of the sweetest dreams that indicate that this person will enter a new life and this life is full of happiness and joy, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees She is praying in the mosque, then this dream expresses getting rid of the worries and problems that she is currently facing, especially the problems that exist between her and her ex-husband. And if she sees that she is praying among a large group, this is good news that God will compensate her for her ex-husband and that she will marry of good character, and what you are committing of Sins and transgressions. If a man sees himself climbing the pulpit, this is a sign that he will reach a very high position in society. As for seeing the mosque being demolished, it is one of the prominent dreams that express many disagreements, problems, and losses. From work. As you can see, the interpretation of a dream about a mosque in a dream according to Al-Osaimi carries many distinctive omens for us. title: What is the interpretation of scholars who see Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in a dream?

preview.html: The vision of scientists is one of the wondrous visions for the dreamer to know the connotations and meanings of this dream. The dreamer may see a famous or unknown scientist. In particular, it indicates that something praiseworthy has happened to the dreamer, as many dreamers of this vision believe that this dream carries positive messages for him. What did the dream interpreters say about the meaning of this dream? This is explained in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing a religious scholar in a dream. If the dreamer dreams that he kisses the hand of a religious scholar in a dream, this is a sign of salvation from all evil, and God knows best. When the dreamer dreams of drinking water from a religious scholar, this indicates good character that he has. By the visionary. If you see milk from a religious man in a dream, this means that the dreamer is in good health. If the dreamer dreams that he is a religious scholar who is addressing him and warning him about something, then this is a message alerting him to the necessity of repenting before God and staying away from the sins he is committing. If the dreamer sees Himself accompanies a religious scholar to many places in a dream, the meaning of this vision lies in the abundance of goodness and livelihood for the dreamer. The vision of a religious scholar generally expresses relief from anxiety and reveals the cloud over insight if he is facing a problem in his life. The vision of a religious scholar is also reflected in an act Goodness in reality. If the dreamer sees many scholars in a dream, this is a sign of his knowledge of reality and the extent of his interest in science. Seeing a religious scholar sleeping indicates the good that the dreamer will obtain. Interpretation of the dream of scholars in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin went on to explain seeing scholars in a dream As evidence of the dreamer’s good condition and his commitment to obeying God. Ibn Sirin also indicated that seeing a religious scholar in a dream represents the arrival of comfort and comfort for the dreamer. This vision carries an aversive symbol that reflects the dreamer’s fear of something in reality. Also, when the dreamer sees a religious scholar who is unable to Explaining his message to people in a dream, this is a sign of the dreamer’s tension, sadness, and poor health. If the dreamer sees that he is sitting with a religious scholar, this is a sign that the dreamer is suffering from a health problem, and God knows best. Seeing a religious scholar in a dream reflects the dreamer’s desire to benefit from knowledge in reality. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing a religious scholar in a dream. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of this dream is an indication of the dreamer’s good condition and his obtaining the highest ranks in his profession. Seeing a scholar in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s erudition and enjoyment of abundant knowledge. If the dreamer sees in a dream a religious man, he transforms from a man From an old man to a young man, this is a promising dream and strength. If the dreamer sees a religious scholar in white clothes and a beard, this is good news for him. This vision promises good news about the end of crises and a change for the better in the dreamer’s life. In the case of a dream that talks about a religious scholar in a dream, this The vision is a warning message about the need to pay attention to the dreamer’s wrong actions in reality. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing a religious scholar in a dream. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing a religious scholar in a dream is evidence of the high status he already enjoys. But if the dreamer sees that he has become a scholar and people are influenced by his words and application

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a stick in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a stick in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The stick in a dream is one of the visions that attracted the attention of many interpreters due to the variety of raw materials used in its construction and its different sizes. Through an Egyptian website, each of you will know the meaning of the vision, according to what the greatest translators such as Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Miller’s Encyclopedia said through the article below. Stick in a dreamInterpretation of a stick in a dream indicates the dreamer’s victory over his opponents, and Ibn Sirin confirmed that if the dreamer holds a stick in his dream This vision means that he knows a mentally and physically strong person and continues to consult him in his own business because he is smart and his opinions are correct. The dream of a stick interprets that the dreamer’s money and wealth will increase and his profits will double, and if he desires to be a ruler or a sultan, God will grant him this desire soon. Among the unpleasant visions The dreamer dreamed that his stick was broken, and Ibn Sirin said that this vision contains four interpretations for four different situations. The first case: If the dreamer has enemies and opponents who are trying to kill him, then this dream is an indication that his defeat will soon be at their hands. The second case confirms that the dreamer’s life is not happy, And that his sadness increases either by falling into some problems or by being exposed to the injustice and wrongdoing of one of the people he dealt with before. The third case warns the dreamer that if he saves money and keeps it so that he does not fall victim to debt over time, he will unfortunately have a share in losing his money and returning it to zero again. The fourth case, that is, if the fortuneteller does not walk among the people with his head held high in the coming days, a problem will happen to him that will cause him humiliation and shame. The stick in Al-Osaimi’s dream. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is witnessing a big fight between a group of men and each one hits the other with a stick and the fighting continues until the dreamer wakes up. From his sleep, this dream confirms that these men are enemies. Of the dreamer and seeks to destroy his life, he should not mix with anyone in an excessive way, so as not to allow anyone to enter his life and see his private secrets, and therefore the dreamer’s private life will be destroyed and harming him will be a simple matter. Paste Dream Interpretations Ibn Shaheen said that if he sees The dreamer is walking on the road with a stick that he leans on so as not to fall. This vision confirms that the dreamer will fall into trouble and will ask for support from a person known for his purity and generosity of morals, and this person will be the reason for helping the monarch and solving his problem. Among the visions that some dreamers wonder about is a vision The dreamer is holding a stick in his hand and suddenly it grows longer. Interpretation of the dream means that the dreamer wanted something impossible, but after this vision God will speed up the fulfillment of his desire by the dreamer, but if the opposite happens and the dreamer sees in his dream that the stick in his hand is getting shorter and shorter, then the interpretation of the dream will be the opposite of the previous interpretation. Of the frightening visions Sometimes the dreamer dreams that he is holding a stick in his hands and suddenly the stick changes and becomes a poisonous snake. This dream has a bad interpretation, which is that the dreamer had a friend and they lived together, for example

title: Interpretation of a dream about war and bombing in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing war by Ibn Sirin Explanation of Ibn Sirin Seeing war in a dream is a sign of rising prices and poor living conditions. For those who dream of a war in which soldiers and soldiers prevail, this war refers to his life and the soldiers are the difficulties and obstacles he faces in his life. And we see a bomb exploding in a dream This dream indicates the occurrence of a major event and a major problem. And whoever sees in a dream that he is preparing to go to war, this dream is a good omen and indicates that he will receive good news. And whoever sees in a dream that he is fighting on the battlefield This dream is considered a warning sign for the dreamer, as it indicates the presence of an enemy near him and wants to harm him in various ways. And whoever sees himself fighting on the battlefield and killing a soldier, this dream is a sign of victory and success in something. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of soldiers and soldiers in a dream as a sign of family problems. Anyone who hears gunshots or uses a gun to shoot in a dream, this dream indicates the problems and difficulties he faced in his life. As for the one who glorifies or listens to the glorification in war, this dream is a sign of success in something. Interpretation of seeing war and battle in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that he entered a war and lost in it, this dream indicates The dreamer will be betrayed. The married man who sees the battlefield in a dream shows this dream to the wife and her cruelty and control over the affairs of the home and life to a large extent. As for the one who sees in a dream the body of a dead soldier, this dream indicates the loss of a family member, but if the dreamer is sick, this dream may indicate recovery and the death of misery. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing war in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is fighting and fighting some people, this dream indicates the dreamer’s deception of these people in the dream. And whoever dreams that the people of his town are fighting the sultan, this dream may indicate a drop in prices. Al-Nabulsi explained that whoever sees war in a dream, this dream may indicate the spread of the plague in his city and its elimination, and seeing war in a dream may indicate the spread of strife among its members in the same country. Seeing war in a dream can be a sign of distress, sadness and severe distress for the residents of his city. Interpretation of war by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen interprets the vision of sitting with soldiers during the war period in a dream, and this dream indicates that the dreamer will cooperate with lasting friendship. As for the one who dreams of eating food from the soldiers of war, this is a sign of a reconciliation initiative on the part of The dreamer towards his enemy. As for those who dream of killing a soldier in war, this is a sign of good luck and abundance for the dreamer. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing war in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we receive your comments at the bottom of the article on the site and we will provide you with the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of smoke in a dream: Seeing smoke in a dream

preview.html: Black and white smoke without fire for a pregnant woman in the house, fire smoke for a married woman, a pack of cigarettes, smoking for unmarried people, smoke. Interpretation of smoke in a dream. Seeing smoke symbolizes unlimited luck. Seeing smoke in general indicates news spreading from the side from which the smoke is rising. Seeing thick smoke is a sign of not Certainty and confusion about the futureSeeing light smoke is a sign of romantic illusions and dreamsSeeing smoke from a fire in a house or city is a sign of defeatSeeing smoke rising from the mouth or nose is a sign of success in loveSometimes seeing smoke in a dream is a sign of fame or false illusionsSeeing yourself in the middle of smoke Seeing smoke rising from the workplace is a sign of goodness after hardship. Seeing smoke without fire is a sign of unfair doubts and doubts. Seeing smoke rising is a sign of success and vice versa, seeing smoke falling is a sign of defeat. Seeing white smoke is a sign of pleasant surprises. Seeing smoke in a frightening dream indicates betrayal. Seeing black, thick smoke is an indication of a temporary problem that will quickly fade. Seeing pure, clean smoke is a sign of love for a partner. Seeing smoke rising from a fireplace or hut is a sign of loneliness. Seeing cigarette smoke is a sign of domestic fears. If one dreams of smoking, it indicates God’s punishment. The Almighty. If a person dreams of smoking in a dream, this indicates the punishment of the Sultan. Whoever dreams of smoke coming out of his house, this means that he will emerge well and fertile after calamities and scandals. If a person dreams that he is smoking under a pot of food, this indicates kindness and prosperity. If a person dreams that he is smoking for things It has no smell, this indicates horror and a great scandal. If one dreams that he is covered in smoke, this means that he will develop a fever. If one dreams of being hit by hot smoke, this indicates worry and worry. If a person dreams of seeing smoke, this indicates intense battles. If a person dreams of seeing smoke This indicates harm to people. If a person dreams of smoke, this indicates extinction and drought. If a person dreams of smoke, this indicates the direction from which he comes. Whoever sees smoke rising from his place, then goodness and fertility will fall into him after terror and scandal, and this is from the Sultan. If there is smoke under a pot with fresh meat in it, then he is good, fertile and happy after the horror he will experience. If you dream of seeing a chimney, this means that an embarrassing event will happen in your life. You will quickly receive news of illness. If an irregular chimney falls, it means possible grief or death in your family. If you see a chimney covered with ivy or vines, this foretells happiness that will arise from sadness or loss of relatives. If you see a fire burning in a chimney, it means that a lot of good things are coming your way. If you are hiding in a chimney corner, it means that bad luck or thorns will find you.

Interpretation Seeing hair in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Growing worries and problems of the world for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing hair in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Happiness and abundant livelihood, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing hair in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Eating a lot of food and healing from illness. Interpretation of seeing a dream of long hair by Al-Osaimi in a dream. A vision appears. Long hair in a dream has many interpretations, including bad and good. Losing long hair in a dream symbolizes upcoming crises and obstacles that the dreamer will go through in his life, and God knows best. Dreaming of long hair in a beautiful-looking woman’s dream indicates wealth and goodness, and God knows best. As was said. It is good news for the upcoming marriage date in the girl’s vision. Seeing long hair in a man’s dream symbolizes goodness, abundance, and success in life for the beholder, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dream of cutting hair in a dream by Al-Osaimi. The dream of cutting hair in a dream indicates the emergence of some changes and changes in the circumstances that are occurring. In the life of the dreamer, whether he is a man or a human, and God knows best. Seeing a beautiful haircut in a married woman’s dream symbolizes upcoming happy news, kindness, and ease. Dreaming of a man cutting his hair means overcoming crises and obstacles and ending suffering in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. And seeing a husband cutting his wife’s hair in a dream indicates control and control over the family and home. It was also said that there are disagreements and quarrels that occur between spouses, and God knows best. Seeing tangled and dull hair in a dream symbolizes the end of suffering, the death of anxiety, and relief after anxiety and distress. A dream about dyeing hair indicates a change in Situation, depending on the situation in which the dreamer finds himself. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a mountain in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Dreaming of seeing a mountain in a dream, seeing a mountain in a dream shows prestige and power, and seeing falling from a mountain means losing money and prestige or disobedience and deeds. The dream interpretation of a mountain in a dream, according to leading Arab translators and researchers, is one of the dreams that many people see and actually search for until they get the perfect interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream. This vision certainly indicates many meanings and indicators. Dreaming about the top of the mountain indicates that the dreamer will treat the sick and give zakat to orphans. This dream will be explained in a simple and clear way through this article. Interpretation of a dream about a mountain by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a mountain in a dream is evidence of a religious person. Dreaming of seeing a mountain in a dream, but seeing a mountain with plants is a sign of kingship. As for seeing a mountain collapsing in a dream, It indicates the death of a great man or his surrender through the Sultan. Seeing a mountain moving, but stabilizing, is evidence of suffering but it will go away. Seeing the dreamer falling from a mountain is a sign of committing sins. Interpretation of a dream about a mountain according to Al-Nabulsi: Seeing a mountain moving indicates a problem in approaching the dreamer. Dreaming Seeing a mountain in a dream. As for seeing a mountain being demolished in a dream, this is a sign of victory in reality. Seeing the disappearance of a mountain in a dream inside the earth is evidence of the death of the king of this land. Dreaming of looking at the top of a mountain means that the dreamer will treat the sick and give orphans as charity. To dream of climbing a mountain It means that you will achieve what the dreamer wants in life. Also, seeing a mountain in a dream is a sign of goodness and blessings. Seeing a mountain, but from a distance, also indicates travel or stress and sadness. Seeing a dreamer on top of a mountain means a long life. Interpretation of a dream about a mountain Green: Seeing a mountain with an abundant green color is evidence of the abundant goodness that he will receive in this world. Seeing a man as if he climbed a mountain and found food, indicates his marriage to a rich woman. Dreaming of seeing a mountain in a dream Seeing a dream about climbing Mount Arafat It is a sign of the good that he gets from drawing lots. A married man who sees that he is climbing a mountain and finds water in it and actually drinks from it is evidence that he has achieved his goals and earns a lot of money from it. Seeing a throw from the top of a mountain is evidence that he is throwing obscene words at people. A dream Seeing a mountain in a dream: To see a mountain climbing without fatigue and difficulty means the dreamer’s death. As for seeing the dreamer stop climbing the mountain in a dream, this is evidence of his death at an early age. Other interpretations of a dream about a mountain: A dream about seeing a mountain in a dream If you see a mountain in a dream, this means It means that new decisions will be made in the fortuneteller’s life. Dreaming about the highest mountain peak is a sign of success. When a girl sees that she is climbing a mountain with one of her relatives and smiles, this is a sign of a change in her life for the better. Dreaming about seeing a mountain in a dream is seeing a landscape While standing on a mountain in a dream indicates the arrival of a period full of goodness. Seeing a volcano rising from a mountain indicates upcoming difficulties in the dreamer’s life. To see yourself climbing a mountain in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman as if
